name: Trickstar Gig
text:
Can be used if your Life Points are at 2000 or below. Send cards from the top of your Deck to the Graveyard up to the number of "Trickstar" monsters you control.
Then, you can add 1 "Trickstar" card from your Graveyard to your hand.
This Skill can only be used once per Duel.
